name: epubify
description: Generate an ePub book from a simple plaintext descriptor.
author: nabijaczleweli <nabijaczleweli@gmail.com> (https://nabijaczleweli.xyz)

scripts.build: flow && babel src/ -d dist/ && bash process_includes.sh assets/ dist/*.js
scripts.bundle: sh -c "mkdir -p dist/bundle && browserify -u dist/main.js dist/*.js -o dist/bundle/epubify.js" && uglifyjs --source-map -o dist/bundle/epubify.min.js -- dist/bundle/epubify.js
scripts.man: ronn --organization="gen-epub-book.js developers" gen-epub-book.md && sh -c "mkdir -p ./dist/man" && mv gen-epub-book.1 dist/man/gen-epub-book.js.1 && mv gen-epub-book.1.html dist/man/gen-epub-book.js.1.html
